sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Intermodal Facilities Promotion Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Intermodal Facilities Promotion Act.

sections.heading: Purpose. The General Assembly has determined that it is in the interest of the State of Illinois to promote development that will protect, promote, and improve freight rail systems and their intermodal connections in Illinois and encourage the efficient development of those facilities
